name: Ext_R2_TestScript_me_ca_conformance
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.TestScript.metadata.capability.conformance for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents TestScript.metadata.capability.conformance from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/TestScript|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: Minimum conformance required of server for test script to execute successfully.   If server does not meet at a minimum the reference conformance definition, then all tests in this script are skipped.
element.comment: `TestScript.metadata.capability.capabilities` maps to R4 `TestScript.metadata.capability.capabilities`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
